Reviews.Title: “Horrible!!! Stay well away!!! Avoid at all cost!!!”
Reviews.Author: rsb23
Reviews.Content: This place is just horrible, I travel a lot and I haven't seen nor experienced anything like it. I had seen better in third world countries! Apartments are old, dirty and dated, I had stayed in their "refurbished" apartments but they were done so cheaply it already looks dated and very dirty! It also smells!!! Do yourself a favour and stay well away! There are a few apartments in the area that is far better, a bit more expensive but it will not ruin your trip. There are also no fire and safety instructions you normally find in short term stay accommodation. Lift/Elevator is tiny and often broken. Extremely poor! Don't waste your money and go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “The Pictures what you see on the website is Executive flat pictures not the Standard pictures, please don’t get confused”
Reviews.Author: laserklasse
Reviews.Content: Hi There, I saw the review earlier about flat pictures what you see on the website is different from actual flat itself….. I like to say even I thought the same but when I went to this apartment then I ask the same thing, then they told me the pictures what you see on the website is executive flat pictures (high rate) but not the standard flat pictures....Then I realise the gentleman who write review he might have book standard flat but he was expecting executive flat what he saw pictures on the website.....Anyway as I book executive flat for my trip and I did enjoyed my stay with same flat pictures what I saw on the website with great location and great service.

Reviews.Title: “Value for the Money with great service”
Reviews.Author: rajesh099
Reviews.Content: We went for holiday for one week, this place recommended by my friend it’s a nice place with very good location and nice staff. We enjoyed our stay with huge Sainsbury very near to it and underground train station. It was nice experience to us anyway.

Reviews.Title: “website horribly misleading, rooms dated and dirty”
Reviews.Author: seabonnette
Reviews.Content: and they have staff members putting positive reviews on Google - see "Osman's" review. the place is in a good location but it's certainly overpriced and not at all what they advertise on their website. there are no leather couches, glass tables, etc. the internet NEVER works (i had to go out and buy a separate wireless service) and the you get about 2 channels on TV. the rooms are extremely dated. the kitchen in my apartment had a cracked countertop with mold growing underneath, mildew all over the bath, dirty carpets and they were "renovating" while i was staying there so there was dust, debris, everywhere. also you can smell everyone's food cooking in the entire place.

Reviews.Title: “Good value apartments”
Reviews.Author: Ludal
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for a week a party of five, the apartment was basic but very clean, with half maid service daily, situation was perfect near from underground (5min) and sainsbury (30sec). Friendly service. Would definitely come back and stay in the same flat there cause cheap for london and nice apartments (even though the one we stayed in was not as modern as on the website).

Reviews.Title: “The worst ever place I stayed in”
Reviews.Author: rsb23
Reviews.Content: Their website misleads..they show a very nice modern apartment but in actual fact they only have one of this apartment to show and to advertise on the web. Most apartments are dirty, dilapidated, bathroom was dirty, most furnishing are falling apart, kitchen staff are mix and match, it seemed bought from a second hand shop. The staff were nice if not almost embarrased that they work there, there is so much they can do as they are paid staff. AVOID THIS ESTABLISHMENT AT ALL COST!!! There is a lot better apartments for this price.

HotelInfo.Name: Oxbridge Apartments
HotelInfo.Address: 8 Collingham Road | Kensington, London SW5 OLT, England
